title: Talon Rework

embed.description: I would like to know if there are any plans to give him something more meaningful. Ever since his last nerf there hasnt been any mention of him. If anything is the name of his E going to be changed because it doesnt fit the ability anymore.

replies.body:
Bitte nicht. Er ist fine wie er ist. 
Bester AD-Midlaner zurzeit.
seit dem nerv ist talon besser als Zed ;) viel besser xD
